node.text_zh:
反修例運動擴闊民主陣營抗爭路線，初選期間部分候選人以「讓本土派成為主流」為口號互相站台；有傳統泛民政黨候選人因而告急，初選結果可謂各路線支持者的大型民意調查。
本土及抗爭派候選人
港島：梁晃維 彭卓棋 袁嘉蔚
九西：馮達浚 劉澤鋒 張崑陽
九東：李嘉達 黃之鋒
新西：張可森 伍健偉 黃子悅
新東：鄒家成 劉頴匡 呂智恆 何桂藍 林景楠
超區：王百羽 岑敖暉
node.text_en:
The whole political movement has signficantly widened the political spectrum and conflicts in ideals/ approaches within the Pro-Democracy camp, specifically, the Localists and the Resistence Camp vs the other moderate Pro-Democracy Camp parties. As a result, many have regarded this primaries as a polling for the acceptance of the radical appraoch led by the Localists and the Resistence Camp.
Resistance & Localist Candidates
HKI: Fergus Leung, Michael Pang, Tiffany Yuen
KLW: Frankie Fung, Nathan Lau, Sunny Cheung
KLE: Kinda Li, Joshua Wong
NTW: Sam Cheung, Ng Kin Wai, Prince Wong
NTE: Owen Chow, Ventus Lau, Hendick Lui, Gwyneth Ho, Mike Lam
Super Seat: Henry Wong, Lester Shum
